firstName.description: First name of the person (32 characters max)

lastName.description: Last name of the person (32 characters max)

middleName.description: OPTIONAL. Middle name of the person (32 characters max)

personID.description: OPTIONAL. Client side identifier of the person to fetch information later

dateOfBirth.description: The full birth date of the person in YYYY-MM-DD format

line1.description: Full number and name of street, avenue, road etc. (max 48 chars)

city.description: City corresponding to the address (max 30 chars)

state.description: 2-Letter US state abbreviation or max 30 chars (e.g. "NY")

postalCode.description: Postal code corresponding to the address (max 10 chars)

businessName.description: The legal name of the business as seen in your legal document (32 chars max)

phone.description: Official phone number of a business

businessID.description: OPTIONAL. A unique identifier on your side to fetch business information later

formationDate.description: Date of the formation of the business based on your legal document

line1.description: Full number and name of street, avenue, road etc. (max 48 chars)

city.description: City corresponding to the address (max 30 chars)

state.description: 2-Letter US state abbreviation or max 30 chars (e.g. "NY")

postalCode.description: Postal code corresponding to the address (max 10 chars)

identification.description: Employer identification details as seen on your legal document

idNumber.description: The number of the identification document attached

businessID.description: Identifier of the business that you want to create an account for. Not required when creating an account for Person

personID.description: Identifier of the person that you want to create an account for. Not required when creating an account for a Business

accountType.description: "GENERAL": Issued to end user or cardholders, "REVENUE": to ledger fees or revenue for a program, "COLLECTION": created for a Company to collect funds from multiple accounts
